1: @@//lam ye shes rgya mtsho ste// byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu med//snying rje chen po blo yi mchog /shes rab chen po blo che na ldan//thabs chen byed za chen po ste//rdzu
2: 'phrul chen po stobs dang ldan//shugs chen mgyogs pa che na po ste//rdu 'phrul chen po cher grags pa// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa po //srid pa'i ri bao tchen po 'joms//mkhregs
3: shing rdo rje chen po 'chang//drag po chen po drag shul che//'jigs chen 'jigs par byed pa po //mgon po rigs mchog chen po ste//bla ma gsang sngags che ba mcog /theg pa chen po'i
4: tshul gnas pa//theg pa chen po'i chul gyi mchog /rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshigs su bcad pa bcu bzhi'o///sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che//thub pa chen po
5: thub cen ldan//gsang sngags tshul cen las byung ba//gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can //pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ste//pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas//pha rol phyin bcu dag
6: pa ste//pha rol phyin pa bcu yi tshul//sae bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po ste//sa bcu la ni rab tu gnas//shes bcu rnam dag bdag nyid can//shes bcu rnam dag 'chang ba bo // rnam ba
7: bcu po don bcu'i don //thub dbang stobs bcu khyab pa'i bdag kun gyi don ni ma lus byed // rnam bcu dbang ldan che ba po// thog ma med pa spros med bdag / de bzhin nyid bdag dag pa'i
8: bdag /yang dag smra zhing tshog gzhan med //ji skad smra ba de bzhin byed//gnyis su med dang gnyis med smra//yang dag mtha' la rnam par gnas//bdag med sedg+ge'i sgra dang ldan//nmu stegs
